speaker: giffany
dialog: Heyaaaa! Ooh you're looking great today, you do something with your hair?

speaker: giffany
dialog: Anyways, welcome to Catching Feels, your first minigame!

speaker: giffany
dialog: It's simple, all you gotta do is use the left and right arrows to control the cart, and make sure you collect as many of my hearts as possible!
